import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./Navbar.css"; import logo from "../images/logo-transparent.svg"; function Navbar() { const [click, setClick] = useState(false); function handleClick() { setClick(!click); const navMenu = document.querySelector(".nav-menu"); const navLinksCon = document.querySelector(".nav-mobile-links-container"); if (!click) { navMenu.style.width = "100%"; navMenu.style.left = "0px"; navLinksCon.style.opacity = "1"; navMenu.style.transitionDelay = "0s"; } else { navMenu.style.left = "-100px"; navMenu.style.width = "0%"; navMenu.style.transitionDelay = ".4s"; navLinksCon.style.transitionDelay = "0s"; navLinksCon.style.opacity = "0"; } } const closeMobileMenu = () => setClick(false); return (

MENU

    TEARS.

  • Shisha

  • Live Music
  • Delivery
  • Contact
); } export default Navbar;
